assetProfile.address2: Near Hira Rupa Hall Bopal-Ambli Road Bopal
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vishal Fabrics Limited engages in dyeing, printing, and processing of fabrics and yarns in India. It offers Denim bottom, Denim shirting, and jegging fabrics for men, women, and kids. The company also exports its products. Vishal Fabrics Limited was founded in 1972 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
